TextLibrary.Text: The Minotaurs are too strong. You must try again.
The Chieftain has defeated you, but you must try again.
You must travel to the city of Tusk and challenge the Minotaurs to try and win the Horns of Sartek.
To win the Horns of Sartek, you must defeat a Minotaur Chieftain in battle.
You must return the Horns of Sartek to Tauron at the Horned Temple.
Tauron is pleased to see the Horns. Now only 7 pieces of Sartek remain.
You have shown your worth to the tribe. Now you must challenge their leader.
You have defeated the Minotaur Chieftain. You claim the Horns of Sartek as your prize.
The Chieftain is better armored than most Minotaurs and can cast the Cleave spell.
